rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious hall leading into an open living/dining space with a Bohemian aesthetic, featuring eclectic art, vintage furniture, and a mix of textures. The room layout maximizes natural light from the West-facing windows.

vastu_considerations.directional_alignment: West-facing walls to ensure optimal flow of natural light and energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet eclectic kitchen, incorporating bohemian design elements with rustic finishes. The layout allows for an open-concept feel while ensuring efficient workflow.

vastu_considerations.directional_alignment: Kitchen placement is oriented to allow for easy access from the dining area while aligning with local building norms.

rooms.name: Studio Space
rooms.description: A versatile studio space that serves as a home office and creative workspace, blending functionality with bohemian decor.

vastu_considerations.directional_alignment: Positioned to benefit from indirect light while promoting creativity.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact and efficient bathroom designed with sustainable fixtures. The layout respects local building norms and is conveniently located adjacent to the studio space.

vastu_considerations.directional_alignment: Located in a suitable position according to Vastu guidelines for water-related spaces.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.location: South side of the ground floor, leading into the living area.

openings.name: West-facing Windows
openings.type: large window openings for maximum natural light

openings.name: Balcony Access to Rooftop Terrace
openings.type: staircase connecting ground floor to second level (rooftop terrace)

vastu_principles: West-facing plot is ideal for creativity and energy, aligning with the bohemian style.
Natural light maximized by strategic placement of openings along the west side.
irregular_plot_adjustments: The layout is designed to adapt to an irregular plot shape by centralizing the living area and optimizing space distribution on each level.
